name: FrogJump
description:
This is a simple platform jumping game, this is my first time making a game, please choose carefully.
The player takes the role of a frog who jumps out of his comfort zone and finds the sea.


Your goal is only up, up, up, until you get to the boat.

Game play: bold challenge, reasonable control of their drag mouse length and direction, once the choice of failure, home from the new.

[Game operations:] only need to hold the left mouse button drag, release jump. The length of the mouse drag determines the height of the jump. Once you release the mouse and start jumping, you cannot change direction or height.


Reasonable drag mouse jump, may cause your high blood pressure.

It takes about 1 hour for the author to clear the customs.
